ValidationRule.description: If Proprietary Group is selected then the New Proprietary Group field should be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Proprietary', OR( PRIORVALUE(Proprietary_Group__c) <> Proprietary_Group__c, PRIORVALUE(New_Proprietary_Group__c) <> New_Proprietary_Group__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(Proprietary_Group__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(New_Proprietary_Group__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If a Proprietary Group has been selected, the New Proprietary Group field must be blank.
